import React, {useState, useEffect}from 'react' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import{ Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, Card, ListGroupItem } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import axios from 'axios' function ProductScreen({match}) { const productID = useParams() const [product, setProduct] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { async function fetchProduct(){ const { data } = await axios.get(`/api/products/${product.productID}`) setProduct(data) } fetchProduct() }, []) return (
Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'}
); } export default ProductScreen
